statements: SELECT * FROM waste_diversion_metrics;
SELECT program_name, total_waste_collected FROM waste_diversion_metrics WHERE recycling_rate > 50;
SELECT waste_diversion_id, program_name, total_waste_collected, recycling_rate FROM waste_diversion_metrics WHERE total_waste_collected >= 1000;
SELECT program_name, recycling_rate FROM waste_diversion_metrics ORDER BY recycling_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM waste_diversion_metrics WHERE program_name LIKE 'abc%';
SELECT * FROM waste_diversion_metrics WHERE program_name LIKE 'Recycling%';
SELECT program_name, total_waste_collected FROM waste_diversion_metrics WHERE recycling_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY total_waste_collected DESC;
SELECT program_name, total_waste_collected, recycling_rate FROM waste_diversion_metrics WHERE program_name = 'Eco-Friendly Program' OR program_name = 'Green Initiative';
SELECT program_name, SUM(total_waste_collected) AS total_waste, AVG(recycling_rate) AS average_rate FROM waste_diversion_metrics GROUP BY program_name HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2 ORDER BY total_waste DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT program_name, MIN(total_waste_collected) AS min_waste, MAX(total_waste_collected) AS max_waste FROM waste_diversion_metrics WHERE recycling_rate < 0.2;
SELECT * FROM Waste_Diversion_Metrics
SELECT program_name, recycling_rate FROM Waste_Diversion_Metrics
SELECT program_name, waste_diverted FROM Waste_Diversion_Metrics WHERE recycling_rate > 0.5
SELECT * FROM Recycling_Programs
SELECT program_name, program_description, start_date FROM Recycling_Programs
SELECT * FROM Waste_Diversion_Metrics WHERE recycling_rate > 50 ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT program_name, waste_diverted FROM Waste_Diversion_Metrics WHERE waste_diverted >= 1000 AND recycling_rate < 70;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM Recycling_Programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT program_name, recycling_rate, date_recorded FROM Waste_Diversion_Metrics WHERE recycling_rate BETWEEN 30 AND 60 ORDER BY program_name DESC, date_recorded ASC;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM Recycling_Programs WHERE program_name LIKE '%Recycling%' AND start_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM waste_diversion_metrics;
SELECT id, date, materials_type, weight_in_kg FROM waste_diversion_metrics WHERE weight_in_kg > 100;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM recycling_programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM measurement_results ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT program_id, date, diversion_rate FROM measurement_results WHERE diversion_rate >= 0.5;
SELECT * FROM waste_diversion_metrics WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM recycling_programs WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT materials_type, weight_in_kg FROM waste_diversion_metrics WHERE weight_in_kg > 1000 ORDER BY weight_in_kg DESC;
SELECT AVG(diversion_rate) AS average_diversion_rate FROM measurement_results;

SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date, diversion_rate FROM recycling_programs JOIN measurement_results ON recycling_programs.id = measurement_results.program_id WHERE diversion_rate > 50 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM RecyclingCenters;
SELECT center_name, location FROM RecyclingCenters ORDER BY center_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, category, weight FROM Items WHERE weight > 10;
SELECT center_name, capacity FROM RecyclingCenters WHERE capacity >= 100 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT center_name, location, total_weight FROM RecyclingCenters JOIN Metrics ON RecyclingCenters.center_id = Metrics.center_id;
SELECT center_name, location FROM RecyclingCenters;
SELECT item_name, category, weight FROM Items WHERE weight > 10;
SELECT center_name, location, capacity FROM RecyclingCenters WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT item_name, category, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Items JOIN RecyclingTransactions ON Items.item_id = RecyclingTransactions.item_id GROUP BY Items.item_id;
SELECT center_name, location, total_weight, recycling_rate FROM RecyclingCenters JOIN Metrics ON RecyclingCenters.center_id = Metrics.center_id WHERE total_weight >= 100 AND recycling_rate < 0.8;
SELECT * FROM waste_diversion_metrics;
SELECT program_name, recycling_rate FROM waste_diversion_metrics ORDER BY recycling_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM collection_points WHERE type='Recycling';
SELECT location, capacity FROM collection_points WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT collection_date, collected_quantity FROM collection_records WHERE collection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM waste_diversion_metrics WHERE recycling_rate > 50;
SELECT program_name, recycling_rate FROM waste_diversion_metrics WHERE program_name LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT location, capacity FROM collection_points ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT collection_date, SUM(collected_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM collection_records GROUP BY collection_date;
SELECT participant_name, program_name FROM program_participants JOIN waste_diversion_metrics ON program_participants.program_id = waste_diversion_metrics.id;
